issue_summary: Lists (ul/ol) across content pages have 0px margin-left and 0px padding-left, causing them to appear dedented instead of properly indented

examples.textPreview: Mobile app foundationsiOS and Android project setu
iOS App Foundation - Set up SwiftUI project and co

root_cause: Base list styles (ul/ol) are missing from _typography.scss. Only specific contexts like .post__content and .glossary-content have list styling.
fix_required: Add base ul/ol/li styles to _typography.scss with proper indentation (margin-left: 1.5em or similar)
